question: Can you please describe a typical diet of Rasullallah including the drinks and food that he partook in a normal day.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It has been reported in Shamaail-e-Tirmidhi that Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) used to eat vinegar as a curry. He also ate chicken, olives, olive
oil. Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) used to love calabash. His favourite
meat as the shoulder of the goat.

Honey, cheese and Ghee was also consumed by Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam). Amongst the drinks of Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) was cold
water, zam zam and milk. Nabeez was prepared and drank by Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam). Nabeez is dates or raisins soaked overnight
in water and drank early in the morning. Fruits consumed by Nabi
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) was watermelon with dates, cucumber with dates
and musk, melon with dates.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
